mapper.update: update msb_mucroom set roomID = #{roomid}, serviceID = #{serviceid}, creationDate = #{creationdate}, modificationDate = #{modificationdate}, name = #{name}, naturalName = #{naturalname}, description = #{description}, lockedDate = #{lockeddate}, emptyDate = #{emptydate}, canChangeSubject = #{canchangesubject}, maxUsers = #{maxusers}, publicRoom = #{publicroom}, moderated = #{moderated}, membersOnly = #{membersonly}, canInvite = #{caninvite}, roomPassword = #{roompassword}, canDiscoverJID = #{candiscoverjid}, logEnabled = #{logenabled}, subject = #{subject}, rolesToBroadcast = #{rolestobroadcast}, useReservedNick = #{usereservednick}, canChangeNick = #{canchangenick}, canRegister = #{canregister} where roomID = #{roomid};
